articles.description: Another new Xbox sale is here, and as ever, we've dived in to bring you another fresh list of quick completions. This week, we have 27 easy Gamerscore titles for your consideration.
articles.content:
• Avatar: The Last Airbender: The Burning Earth5 Achievements worth 1,011 TA (1,000 GS)
  • PixARK32 Achievements worth 1,131 TA (1,000 GS)
  • MONOPOLY Deal15 Achievements worth 1,361 … [+488 chars]
